features.title: Event Planning

testimonials.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonials.comment: The venue was absolutely perfect for our wedding. The staff went above and beyond to make our day special.

testimonials.name: Michael Chen
testimonials.comment: Professional service and amazing attention to detail. Our company event was a huge success.

faqs.question: How far in advance should I book the venue?
faqs.answer: We recommend booking at least 3-6 months in advance for peak seasons, though some dates may require earlier booking.

faqs.question: Can I bring my own catering?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can bring your own catering for an additional fee. However, we recommend our in-house catering services for the best experience.

faqs.question: What is your cancellation policy?
faqs.answer: Full refund if cancelled 60 days before the event, 50% refund if cancelled 30 days before. No refund for cancellations less than 30 days before the event.
